import React, { Component } from 'react'; import Slider from "react-slick"; class HeroCarousel extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, adaptiveHeight: true, adaptiveWidth: true, fade: true, speed: 500, autoplay: true, autoplaySpeed: 2000, cssEase: "linear" }; return (
); } } export default HeroCarousel;
